dataset_summary:
DATASET: RenewableTransitionDataset.csv
Shape: 100 rows x 10 columns

COLUMNS:
  - Country_ID [int64]
  - Country_Name [object]
  - Region [object]
  - Renewable_Energy_pct [float64]
  - Climate_Policy_Score_0_100 [float64]
  - Fossil_Fuel_Subsidy_USD_M [float64]
  - Green_Investment_USD_M [float64]
  - Carbon_Emissions_per_Capita [float64]
  - Grid_Reliability_Score_0_100 [float64]
  - Transition_Tier [object]

agents.name: Elena Rossi
agents.persona_text: Energy economist who tests whether subsidies and prices slow the shift to renewables, and flags perverse incentives.

agents.name: Kwame Mensah
agents.persona_text: Data quality engineer who checks units, ranges, and suspicious outliers across investment and emissions fields.

agents.name: Mina Okada
agents.persona_text: Quant analyst who probes correlations and confounders before anyone claims ‘policy causes X’.

agents.name: Santiago Alvarez
agents.persona_text: Visualization designer who builds dashboards that compare tiers and reveal trade-offs clearly.

agents.name: Aisha Rahman
agents.persona_text: Climate strategist connecting transition progress to a hopeful story of improvement and jobs.
